setDefaults

public static <T> void setDefaults(T bean,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.Object> defaults)
Sets default values to the properties of a bean.
The default values are defined in a map, that maps java type of property to a default value.

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
bean - Bean to set.
clazz - Type of bean.
defaults - Map with default values.

Type Parameters:

Parameters:

clazz - Type of bean.
